page.title: 09Yarlet Hall School
page.content: Every Wednesday and Saturday are half-holidays.On these days boys have tuck after lunch and school matches may be played.Also on these days,boys who have misbehaved are given tasks to do around the school. There are lots of major activities during the school year.Apart from many matches played against othes schools in the main games, there are cross runs,chess ,computing,model making and gardening.Perhaps the climax of the winter term are the carol services held in Barlaston church and the school chapel.At this time too. the cast for the school play in rhe following summer term is announced. The play involves a large cast of perhaps 50 boys,with another 10 or so acting as stage hands or doing the lighting.Mrs Carr,the headmaster's
